titleStmt.title: Dame Dobson, or, The cunning woman a comedy as it is acted at the Duke's Theatre / by Edward Ravenscroft ...
titleStmt.author: Ravenscroft, Edward, 1654?-1707.
Corneille, Thomas, 1625-1709. Devineresse.

notesStmt.note: "An adaption of 'La devineresse; or Les faux enchantemens', by Thomas Corneille and Jean Donneau de Vizé"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"The prologue and epilogue were published separately, 1683."--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
